alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 21 at 2:11AM PST until January 22 at 6:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...San Diego County Valleys and San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 6 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected for late tonight into Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
